meeting_info.location: Dallas City Hall, Council Chambers and Videoconference

agenda_items.title: Call to Order
agenda_items.description: Opening of the meeting by the chair.

agenda_items.title: Approval of Minutes
agenda_items.description: Approval of the minutes for the April 16, 2024 meeting.

agenda_items.title: Resolutions for The Mondello
agenda_items.description: Consider and adopt financing resolutions for The Mondello multifamily residential development.

agenda_items.title: Resolutions for Axis Kessler Park
agenda_items.description: Consider and adopt resolutions for the financing and development of Axis Kessler Park.

agenda_items.title: Appointment of Assistant Investment Officer
agenda_items.description: Consider and adopt a resolution appointing Director David Ellis as Assistant Investment Officer.

agenda_items.title: Review of Treasurer’s Report
agenda_items.description: Review and discussion of DHFC Treasurer’s report for the three-month period ending on March 31, 2024.

agenda_items.title: Review of Pipeline Report
agenda_items.description: Review and discussion of the Corporation’s pipeline report as of May 10, 2024.

agenda_items.title: Discussion on Charitable Contributions
agenda_items.description: Discussion about the Corporation making charitable contributions.

agenda_items.title: Discussion of Conference Take-aways
agenda_items.description: Discussion of take-aways from the National Association of Local Housing Finance Agencies conference.

financial_items.description: Financing resolution for The Mondello multifamily residential development.
Aggregate amount for additional financing for The Mondello development.
